channel.title: Music – 메간 트레이너(Meghan Trainor)
channel.description: Recent content in 메간 트레이너(Meghan Trainor) on Music

item.title: 메간 트레이너(Meghan Trainor) - Made You Look
item.description:
I could have my Gucci on
I could wear my Louis Vuitton
But even with nothing on
Bet I made you look(I made you look)

I’ll make you double take soon as I walk away
Call up your chiropractor just in case your neck break
Ooh, tell me what you, what you
What you gon’ do-ooh
‘Cause I’m ‘bout to make a scene, double up that sunscreen
I’m ‘bout to turn the heat up, gonna make you blast a steam
Ooh, tell me what you, what you
What you gon’ do-ooh

When I do my walk, walk(Oh)
I can guarantee your jaw will drop, drop(Oh)
‘Cause they don’t make a lot of what I got, got(Ah, ah)
Ladies if you feel me, this your bop, bop(Bop-bop-bop)

I could have my Gucci on(Gucci on)
I could wear my Louis Vuitton
But even with nothing on
Bet I made you look(I made you look)
Yeah, I look good in my Versace dress(Take it off)
But I’m hotter when my morning hair’s a mess
Cause even with my hoodie on
Bet I made you look(I made you look)
Mhm-hm-hm

And once you get a taste(Woo), you’ll never be the same
This ain’t that ordinary, this that 14 karat K
Ooh, tell me what you, what you
What you gon’ do-ooh

When I do my walk, walk(Oh)
I can guarantee your jaw will drop, drop(Oh)
‘Cause they don’t make a lot of what I got, got(Ah, ah)
Ladies if you feel me, this your bop, bop(Bop-bop-bop)

Ooh, I could have my Gucci on(Gucci on)
I could wear my Louis Vuitton
But even with nothing on
Bet I made you look(Said I made you look)
Yeah, I look good in my Versace dress(Take it off, baby)
But I’m hotter when my morning hair’s a mess(A mess)
‘Cause even with my hoodie on
Bet I made you look(Said I made you look)

item.title: 메간 트레이너(Meghan Trainor) - Shook
item.description:
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook, got you shook
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook
Uh

Take your power now, save up that energy
Baby, grab a snack, but save some room for me
‘Cause after one night, you look for diamond rings
Yeah, that’s what I call Breakfast at Tiffany’s

Keep your composure
‘Cause I’m coming over
Can tell your neighbors pay no mind to my screams
Ow

Baby, I got you shook(Hey), got you shook, got you shook(Woah)
Baby, I got you shook(C’mon), got you shook, got you shook
I’ll make you break a sweat, maybe you’re obsessed(Uh-huh)
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook, got you shook(Say)
Try to keep your composure, ‘cause I’m coming over
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook

Tell me where you seen a booty like this(Booty like this)
Don’t get distracted when you handle these hips(Handle these hips)
Now, are you to certified to freak with this bitch?(Freak with this bitch)
‘Cause if so, you could have my name on your lips(Name on your lips)
(Mwah)

So try to keep your composure
‘Cause I’m coming over
Can tell your neighbors pay no mind to my screams
Ow

Baby, I got you shook(Woo), got you shook, got you shook(Hey, hey)
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook(Hey, hey, hey), got you shook
I’ll make you break a sweat, maybe you’re obsessed(Uh-huh)
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook, got you shook(Mhm)
Try to keep your composure(Yeah, you should), ‘cause I’m coming over(Ayy)
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook
(Woo, pay attention)

I said, booties like these don’t come ‘round often
Take tomorrow off ‘cause you gon’ feel exhausted
(Don’t be) Don’t be basic, ‘cause I don’t wanna fake it
Get down on your knees and worship me like a goddess
You know I’m better than the girl in your dreams
And tell your neighbors pay no mind to my screams

Baby, I got you shook, got you shook, got you shook(Got you shook, baby)
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook, got you shook(I’ll make you break a sweat)
I’ll make you break a sweat, maybe you’re obsessed(Woo)
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook, got you shook(Hey)
(C’mon try to) Try to keep your composure, ‘cause I’m coming over(Ayy)
Baby, I got you shook, got you shook(I got you, I got you shook, uh, ah)

item.title: 메간 트레이너(Meghan Trainor) - Takin' It Back
item.description:
Takin’ it back
Takin’ it back, back
Back to the bass, they make that good shit
Ayy, make you move your hips
I make you feel like

When the rhythm gets you high, gon’ put you in the mood, ah, yeah(Put you in the mood)
‘Cause you can’t even lie(You can’t even lie)
Kinda makes you wanna move, ah, baby(Makes you, makes you, makes you move)

So when you start to bodyroll
Movin’ to the beat
If you start to lose control
That’s my bad

‘Cause we’re takin’ it back
Takin’ it back, back
Back to the bass, they make that good shit
Ayy, make you move your hips
I make you feel like this
‘Cause we’re takin’ it back
Takin’ it back, back
Back when the bass, sunrise and faces
Ayy, ah, yeah
So won’t you back that bass for me?

You say, “I don’t know what they’re playing on the radio”(Ooh-ooh)
“But if it ain’t that old school, it ain’t got no soul”(Ain’t got no soul)
So let me show you how to do it
Keep on dancin’ to the music
And meet me on the dancefloor(Meet me on the dancefloor)

So when you start to bodyroll
Movin’ to the beat(Ah, yeah)
If you start to lose control
That’s my bad

‘Cause we’re takin’ it back
Takin’ it back, back
Back to the bass, they make that good shit
Ayy, make you move your hips
I make you feel like this
‘Cause we’re takin’ it back
Takin’ it back, back
Back when the bass, sunrise and faces
Ayy, ah, yeah
So won’t you back that bass for me?

Back that bass for me, back that bass for me
Back that, back that, back that bass for me, back that bass for me
Back that bass for me, back that bass for me
Back that, back that, back that bass for me, back that bass for me
‘Cause we’re takin’ it back(Back that bass for me)
Takin’ it back(Back that bass for me)
‘Cause we’re taking it back(Back that bass for me, back that bass for me)
Takin’ it back(Back that bass for me), takin’ it back, back, back
To the(Back that bass for me)
Good shit(Ayy)
(Back that bass for me)

item.title: 메간 트레이너(Meghan Trainor) - No Excuses
item.description:
Huh
What you sippin’ on that got you talking crazy?
Lookin’ at me sideways
always coming at me
Why you why you acting hard
when you just a baby?
Boy I keep it real with you
but you trying to play me
Have you lost your mind?
Open up your eyes
Huh
(Someone else) You must have confused me
confused me with

confused me with

excuses babe

better than that huh
